text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Nahia,

and I'm a Solutions
Architect Manager at AWS.
I manage a team of solutions architects.
So the team is made of builders.
Here at AWS, you are encouraged to build.
So as solutions architect,

we help the customers to
build their solutions.
For me, building is like a way of living,
a way of working,
where we are all owners,

and we can really build
and shape our role.

We take very seriously
development here at AWS.
And as a manager,
my main focus is to develop the team.

So I really believe this
world will be a better place

if we all can make the
best out of our talents.
So that's why I'm involved.

Like at work, I have very much
a solutions architect manager
of the possibility to develop people,

to coach them to focus on
their career progression.
One of my biggest accomplishments,

the thing I most proud of
is in during the last year
I have promoted five people in my team.

You have all the support
of a successful corporation
that it's growing so much,

and you can find there the
way to shape your career
to make the best out of you.
I am Nahia at AWS. I keep being Nahia,

but I have become, I feel
like a better version.
So I am now so much more empowered
with our mechanisms, with our teams.

I am very lucky to be in a
branch that is growing so fast,

that it can help you to
become a better version,
but still being yourself.
(quiet upbeat music)
